description.value: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a save, it can choose to succeed instead.
The dragon uses its Frightful Presence. It then makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 20 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] automatically detects every creature and trap within 30 feet of it, pinpointing the current location of each.

When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hasn’t exhaled its Lightning Breath, the electric charge builds up across its body. While the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Lightning Breath is available, it emits wild sparks of electricity, and each creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[incapacitated]{incapacitated} until the start of its next turn.

Every creature of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s choice within 120 ft. of it must succeed on a [[/save]] save or become &Reference[frightened]{frightened} of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect for itself on a success. If a creature’s save succeeds or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] exhales lightning in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

source.fallback: Tales of the Valiant Monster Vault

description.value: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] roars at up to two creatures of its choice within 120 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a [[/save]] save or be vulnerable to lightning damage until the end of its next turn. A target resistant to lightning damage isn’t resistant to it for the duration. A target immune to lightning damage is still immune to it, even if the target fails the save.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save]] save or take [[/damage average]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can then fly up to half its flying speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
